result.arabic_text: وَٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ بَعۡضُهُمۡ أَوۡلِيَآءُ بَعۡضٍۚ إِلَّا تَفۡعَلُوهُ تَكُن فِتۡنَةٞ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَفَسَادٞ كَبِيرٞ
result.translation: 73.koroositeh yan marak gari garuk awlah keenik yan, moominiiney itta cattaanaah gari gari awla siinik yakkem abe wayteenik, Baaxô bagul kaxxa fitnaa kee kaxxa umaane akkele koros Qande Bahtaah moominiin Boolattaamal.
